item.title: R and Python Can Work Together!
item.description: R can work with python to achieve a variety of goals in convenient ways. For example, below is a short nucleotide sequence that we will define in R as “dnaseq”. #this is a R code chunk library(reticulate) ## Warning: package 'reticulate' was built under R version 3.6.3 dnaseq <- "ATGGCAATAACCCCCCGTTTCTACTTCTAGAGGAGAAAAGTATTGACATGAGCGCTCCCGGCACAAGGGCCAAAGAAGTCTCCAATTTCTTATTTCCGAATGACATGCGTCTCCTTGCGGGTAAATCACCGACCGCAATTCATAGAAGCCTGGGGGAACAGATAGGTCTAATTAGCTTAAGAGAGTAAATCCTGGGATCATTCAGTAGTAACCATAAACTTACGCTGGGCGCGCTTATAG" #your code here Using Python, we are able to determine the length of the sequence and save it as the variable “lon”.
